scene_description_enriched: A group of men, some with beards and wearing crowns or elaborate hats, stand to the left. One man, distinguished by a crown and a golden robe, is presenting a folded golden cloth to another man, who is younger and also dressed in a golden robe and a blue cap. The scene takes place indoors, within a hall with a tiled floor and a richly decorated wall featuring arched niches. To the right, a doorway or alcove is visible, also adorned with architectural details.
